channel.title: I cant get on to my server using my no-ip but i can with 127.0.0.1 please help!
channel.description:
please help me, can you teamview me or something, i am running the source for my server and it does run succesfully but i cant log in using my own no-ip i have to use localhost or 127.0.0.1 please help me get it to work with my own no-ip , even my mates say they cant get in using the no-ip it just wont work, please post helpful information!! :P
Thankks :P Smeed

item.title: I cant get on to my server using my no-ip but i can with 127.0.0.1 please help!
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“smeed07, post:3, topic:408585”][quote author=pastaway link=topic=509867.msg3699560#msg3699560 date=1312662885]
your not supposed to be able to connect to ur server on your own computer your hosting it on with the no-ip. you use 127.0.0.1 everyone else uses the no-ip to connect
[/quote]

yeah i know but my mates cant join using the no-ip
and when i go to register it on moparscape it says that its offline, please help me:([/quote]
Port forwarded?

Read full topic
item.source: I cant get on to my server using my no-ip but i can with 127.0.0.1 please help!
